p: In some situations, individuals are aware of the risks of HIV transmission, but are not able to make the decision for safer sex because of certain attitudes. For example, in some FGDs, discussants mentioned that men often refuse to use condoms because of the attitude that sex using condoms is not pleasurable. In the discussion, participants mentioned that these men will have unprotected intercourse in high risk encounters like among commercial sex workers under this pretext. As one participant stated;
